I'm familiar with ITC using co=
mputers, radios, telephones and other devices. 
=C2=A0
I'd be very interest=
ed in hearing what an EVP from a computer or phone memo sounds like, especi=
ally if they're full sentences asking for help and such. 
=C2=A0
What I mea=
n about "them" using=C2=A0anamolies, fluctuations and variables is simply t=
hat, like an EMF meter=C2=A0that lights up or sounds when there's=C2=A0some=
 change or fluctuation=C2=A0in detectable EM fields & energy patterns/sourc=
es, it seems to create EVP's "they" need something just as=C2=A0adjustable =
(a medium that can be altered and affected)=C2=A0and/OR need to cause/creat=
e/make some kind of fluctuation, variation=C2=A0or adjustment in conditions=
=C2=A0in order to form a voice. 
=C2=A0
I can't see any other way that whit=
e noise OR raw audio could possibly be manipulated to form voices if some t=
ype of fluctuation, alteration or level of variability wasn't present, alre=
ady occuring=C2=A0or made=C2=A0available to them.

well I was just asking cause I ne=
ver seen it before...but you do know you can get evp from ANY recording dev=
ice..well I do,but people does say that's not normal lol..I mean i get evp =
through computers,recorders,my phone memo, or even my kids play recordings.=
 this happens when I'm not even thinking about it sometime is annoying when=
 I'm trying to record something and get not just a moan but sentences..usua=
lly asking for help or just letting me know they can see me..
=C2=A0
Now wi=
th saying that I love my boxes and I get amazing results form those to. I w=

ions" that your speaking of...well at least I don't..


--- On Sat, 1/8/11,=
 Mvanah Maloti <inyanga4@...> wrote:


From: Mvanah Maloti <inyanga4@=
yahoo.com>

1, 10:47 AM


=C2=A0 






It looks like a cool toy, but I'm not sure it w=
ould make a whole ton of difference in one's results, it might even detract=
 from them. Others mileage & opinions may differ, naturally. 
=C2=A0
It see=
ms this device is trying to establish a very=C2=A0loose set of "controls" f=
or capturing and validating EVP, but in my opinion this is the WRONG thing =
to do in some ways...I think "they" need anomalies, fluctuations and variab=
le conditions for the best communication possible=C2=A0(something box-work =
provides them, and abundantly at that!). 
=C2=A0
Since working with the box=
es I don't think I could ever go back to white noise EVP and be happy; the =
sweeping radio is just too effective and light years ahead of what=C2=A0fol=
ks were doing even just=C2=A010-12 years (and months!)=C2=A0ago, I feel. 
=
=C2=A0
Where the sweeping radio functions=C2=A0more like a proper telephone=
 (2 way), traditional EVP just feels like I might as well try=C2=A0tying=C2=
=A0two tin cans together with a string between them and hoping for somethin=
g useful or interesting to=C2=A0be captured or come through. 
=C2=A0
Box wo=
rk just=C2=A0feels=C2=A0a lot more proactive and effective to me=C2=A0in ev=
ery way, shape and form. I can't think of a single advantage=C2=A0that clas=
sical EVP recording & research=C2=A0has or could offer one over=C2=A0the bo=
xes. The skeptics are still going to bitch, moan and continue "debunking" b=
oth EVP and Ghost Box communication=C2=A0either way and that's fine with me=
, I don't work for them and I'm not trying to convince anybody, lol. 
=C2=
=A0
$135.00 could get me another FLIP!=C2=A0 ;)
=C2=A0
-J
=C2=A0

<DIV>It l=
ooks like a cool toy, but I'm not sure it would make a whole ton of differe=
nce in one's results, it might even detract from them. Others mileage &=
 opinions may differ, naturally. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>It seems thi=
s device is trying to establish a very loose set of "controls" for cap=
turing and validating EVP, but in my opinion this is the <U>WRONG</U> thing=
 to do in some ways...I think "they" need anomalies, fluctuations and varia=
ble conditions for the best communication possible (something box-work=
 provides them, and abundantly at that!). </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Sin=
ce working with the boxes I don't think I could ever go back to white noise=
 EVP and be happy; the sweeping radio is just too effective and light years=
 ahead of what folks were doing even just 10-12 years (and months=
!) ago, I feel. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Where the sweeping radio=
 functions more like a proper telephone (2 way), traditional EVP just =
feels like I might as well try tying two tin cans together with a=
 string between them and hoping for something useful or interesting to&nbsp=
;be captured or come through. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Box work just&n=
bsp;feels a lot more proactive and effective to me in every way, =
shape and form. I can't think of a single advantage that classical EVP=
 recording & research has or could offer one over the boxes. =
The skeptics are still going to bitch, moan and continue "debunking" both E=
VP and Ghost Box communication either way and that's fine with me, I d=
on't work for them and I'm not trying to convince anybody, lol. </DIV>
<DIV=
> </DIV>
<DIV>$135.00 could get me another FLIP!  ;)</DIV>
